name: Chili con Carne
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chilies, undrained
instructions: Brown the beef: Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add the ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned. Drain off any excess grease.
Saut√© the vegetables: Add the onion and garlic to the pot and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.

Combine ingredients: Stir in the diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, kidney beans, black beans, diced tomatoes and green chilies, chili powder, cumin, oregano, and cayenne pepper. Season with salt and pepper.
Simmer: Bring the chili to a simmer, then reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for at least 1 hour, or until the flavors have melded. Stir occasionally.
Serve: Serve hot, garnished with chopped cilantro, shredded cheese, sour cream, and chopped green onions (optional).
